name: Raid (itch) (Aniki_ta)
description:
Raid is a First-Person Slasher Arena. An unfortunate magic school scholar has got into big trouble and asks you to help him. Great adventure awaits you as travel through various breathtaking locations. Though, beware of enemies lurking nearby.

This game is still a work in progress in terms of gameplay: loot dropping, using loot to boost player stats, finishing "Book of Relics" to implement a system of collectables.
